all-of.serialization-matches: \{"glossary":\{.*"GlossDiv":\{.*"GlossList":\{"GlossEntry":\{.*"GlossDef":\{.*"para":"A meta-markup language, used to create markup languages such as DocBook.".*\}.*\}\}.*\}.*\}\}
